thread.title: Towie's Kate Wright almost busts out of her sexy skintight outfit in latest social media snap
thread.title_full: Towie's Kate Wright almost busts out of her sexy skintight outfit in latest social media snap

title: Towie's Kate Wright almost busts out of her sexy skintight outfit in latest social media snap
text:
6 Kate Wright almost busted out of her outfit in her latest social media snap 
Kate wore a cream bodycon skirt and a matching cropped top which featured big cut outs across each breast panel, only just about covering her nipples. 
The reality star seemed completely oblivious to how risque her outfit was, as she smiled for the camera as she stood next to a set of drawers and an elaborate full length mirror. 
She captioned the shot: “Never too cold for a two piece love this from @misspap.” xkatiewright/Instagram 6 Kate is known for showing off her stunning figure on social media 
As well as showing off her ample chest, Kate also flashed her tiny waist, which has been a talking point of her followers in recent weeks. 
But the 25-year-old appeared to give away the secret to her nipped in waist, stepping out wearing a tell-tale corset belt last week. Fame Flynet The Towie star appeared to reveal the secrets of her tiny waist last week Instagram 6 Kate was pictured wearing a waist corset while filming Towie 
Kate was filming new scenes for the show outside a hotel in London and she was spotted wearing a pink corset belt. 
The lace-up device appeared to be a waist-trainer, which can be used for slimming if worn on a regular basis. RELATED STORIES LUCK OF THE IRISH Megan McKenna and Kate Wright lead the glam as Towie get set to film their St Patrick's Day party in Essex HITTING WRIGHT BACK Kate Wright is NOT quitting Towie as romance with Rio Ferdinand continues to heat up 'I'M ON HIS SIDE' Towie's James Lock slams Kate Wright for Rio Ferdinand romance that's left Dan Edgar heartbroken MUM'S THE WORD Towie's Kate Wright has banned any mention of love interest Rio Ferdinand in the new series 
The TV beauty wore it over a black mini-dress and thigh-high black boots. 
Kate has been a regular on the ITVBe reality show for two years and has quickly racked up a huge male fan base. Fame Flynet Kate’s curves have been a talking point among her fans for months Kate Wright shows off her high intensity gym routine in Instagram video 
Her busty bikini selfies on Instagram has seen her follower count surge while her tiny waist has been a talking point online.
